data.subject: {xsl:value-of select="in/configuration/generalStoreName" /} Quote [{xsl:value-of select="in/user/username" /} - Order #{xsl:value-of select="in/salesOrder/salesOrderNumber" /}]
data.htmlBody:
{xsl:value-of select="in/configuration/generalStoreName" /} Quote

Thank you for requesting a quote. We'll contact you back as soon as we have reviewed your request. If you have any questions or need assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
 
Quote Number: {xsl:value-of select="in/salesOrder/salesOrderNumber" /}
Order Date: {xsl:value-of select="format-dateTime(in/salesOrder/orderDate, '[Y]-[M01]-[D01] [H01]:[m01]')"/}
Bill To: {xsl:value-of select="in/salesOrder/billingCompany" /}
{xsl:value-of select="concat(in/salesOrder/billingFirstName, ' ', in/salesOrder/billingLastName)" /}
{xsl:value-of select="in/salesOrder/billingStreet" /}, {xsl:value-of select="in/salesOrder/billingCity" /}, {xsl:value-of select="in/salesOrder/billingSubdivisionName" /}, {xsl:value-of select="in/salesOrder/billingPostalCode" /}, {xsl:value-of select="in/salesOrder/billingCountryName" /}
 
Item Qty
